Message.Subject: Looking for a good book on ASP.NET
Message.Body: I’m looking for a book with lot of examples.

Message.Subject: Are you looking for a book for beginners?
Message.Body: What kind of book are you looking for?

Message.Subject: Books for beginers with lot of examples
Message.Body: I’m looking for a book with lot of examples

Message.Subject: Examples with practical applications
Message.Body: Code examples that I could use in my work

Message.Subject: New ASP.NET books are coming out
Message.Body: You may want to checkout amazon.com for new books on ASP.NET

Message.Subject: Thanks, I will
Message.Body: I will check out amazon.com. I may get lucky there.

Message.Subject: Any one has code examples for data source controls
Message.Body: I need code examples that show how to use data source controls in big applications

Message.Subject: What type of data source controls?
Message.Body: There are all kinds of data source controls. Which ones are you planning on using?
